title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Social Work
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Social Work 

Industry) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (social work industry) order 2024

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

the conduct of social work assessments of risk and protective 
factors impacting the safety and welfare of children and adults; 

the design, management, supervision and review of care and/or 
intervention plans; 

the delivery of social work interventions for individuals, 
families and communities; and 

the preparation of reports regarding the protection and welfare 
of children and adults at risk or in need of social services.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) (b) (c) (d) conduct social work assessment risk protective factor impacting safety welfare child adult design management supervision review care intervention plan delivery social work intervention individual family community preparation report regarding protection welfare child adult risk need social service

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 3. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
3. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [177] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 25 April 2024. 

The Seal of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the social work industry in relation to which 
An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its functions 
in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
